welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kokomo, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, vibrant downtown, and unique attractions. Enjoy your time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kokomo Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grissom AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Grissom AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marion Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marion Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
